he Crypt of Vers Never was a tomb located in the Paupers Section of Neverdeath Graveyard in Neverwinter.The name of the crypt is misspelled as belonging to "Vars" Never in Neverwinter. It was presumed to have been built for Vers Never, the ancestor of Lord Dagult Neverember.
The unassuming tomb was identified as the crypt of Vers Never around the , by Retrigal Bookbinder, a scholar working to validate Lord Neverembers claim of descent from Nasher Alagondar. As Vers was known to have settled in Waterdeep, Retrigal presumed that the crypt would be empty, however he hoped that it might still contain something of interest (such as records of Vers Nevers lineage). After identifying the crypt, Retrigal sought to enlist the help of an adventurer to neutralize any undead near it.
